Desc.eng: So you have returned. Speak my name, mortal!
Your name is Albus. (The fool who dared the might of the Death God)
Your name is Infernalus. (A friend buried alive by the Eternal Tsar)
Your name is Damnatus. (Crushed again and again by the Faceless One)
NO, it can't be! You have condemned me to Eternal Damnation, to haunt this place to the end of time! Kill me!
You can't be killed, there is nothing we can do.
Sweet memories of acts of Unspeakable Evil! Mwuhaha. Kneel and die like the cattle you are.
The name of Ascension. So another cycle of my existence can begin. We will never meet again.
